blog.name: ao3feednamjin
blog.title: *winkwonk*
blog.description: This blog is an AUTOMATED blog that uses an IFTTT algorithm to instantly post fics posted under the relationship: Kim Namjoon | RM/Kim Seokjin | Jin tag on ao3. The owner of this blog (hoseokie-jung) only logs in to delete things that don't belong (rp requests, other ships, etc) once every couple of months because she has a terrible memory and forgets that this is, in fact, her blog.

blog.name: bangtans-apollo
blog.title: Apollo
blog.description:
•Coming Soon!•

•Masterlist•


Requests are closed.

They will be open again very soon!

Always feel free to ask me anything!~ Questions, opinions, advice, etc.

body:
Mice (BTS scenario)

No, not living mice.


-


You nodded in determination to yourself, preparing yourself mentally for war. This was it. Your gaze was sharp, you were ready, you were going to do this.


You clicked the mouse ferociously. Why the hell was this taking so damn long? You couldn’t afford to wait around for all of the tickets to disappear!


Sighing, you reloaded the page. What you saw struck you full of horror. Those dreaded words: ‘Sold out’.


No. No. No, no, no, no, no! No!


How could this happen? You had been waiting for hours! How could the tickets sell out on you?


You left the laptop open, and lay down on your bed. Laying your head in your hands, you groaned frustratedly. It was oddly satisfying to do so. So, you whined again. Then another, and another, followed by many more.


You grew tired of just groaning, and allowed yourself to yell out angrily instead. You did that for a number of minutes, yelling about your frustrations.


”Why did the damn tickets have to sell out so damn fast? How could they? Now I’ll never get to see Yoongi perform…I won’t be able to see Jin, or Namjoon, or Hoseok, or Jimin, or Jungkook, or Tae…or Yoongi…” Your yelling had, by now, morphed into miserable sobs.


A short while passed by, as you continued to cry. Your tears had pretty much stained the pillow by now.


“Babe,” A voice called out, “Why are you crying?” He walked over, wrapping his arm around your shoulder comfortingly.


“I…didn’t get any tickets…” You cried, shoving your head onto his shoulder, hugging him tightly.


”That’s what this is about?” He chuckled, “Damn, I rushed over here because I thought I’d done something wrong…”


”You have!” You told him.


”Really?”


“Yes! You and your stupid company!” You spoke, glaring at him through tears eyes.


“Babe, I don’t think that’s the reason they sold out-“”


”Who else can I blame then, huh, Yoongi? I can’t blame your fans, they just want to support you…” You spoke softly this time.


“(Y/n)…” Yoongi muttered, kissing your cheek, “You’re my girlfriend, I can just get you backstage if you want,”


“Yoongi…”


“Besides, why does the concert matter so much? You see me everyday, visit me at the studio, and you’re dating me! I’ll give you a private performance any time you want,”


———-


This is dedicated to all those who didn’t get tickets for a concert.

I hope you enjoyed!

soft yoongi enthusiast

tags: it was supposed to be only 15 fics but i got carried away
summary: yoonkook short fic recs 📕💜 A while ago I did a yoonkook long fic recs, so this time I decided to help those of you who don’t...
body:
yoonkook short fic recs 📕💜

A while ago I did a yoonkook long fic recs, so this time I decided to help those of you who don’t really have that much time to read a long af story, or are just too lazy to do it, and made a small compilation of 25 fics under 5k words, enjoy!

The Perfect Take by jkseuphoria [ yoonkook | teen & up | 3.8k words | side jihope | parallel universes | angst with a happy ending | hyyh/euphoria au ]

As he follows him to the car, Jungkook thinks, someday. In some universe, this hesitance will go. Destiny will give us a chance, all seven of us.

Jungkook’s never believed much in the concept of God, but for once in his life, he prays.

Need an Extra Hand? by Honey0613 [ yoonkook | explicit | 4.1k words | au | handyman yoongi | voyeurism | sex toys | masturbation | top yoongi | power bottom jungkook ]

Yoongi works as a handyman at a fancy apartment complex. He gets a work order request, but when he arrives at the unit, the tenant (Jungkook) is still home … and in the middle of masturbating!

What happens when Yoongi decides to stay and watch the show?

of first kisses and bitter coffee by taers [ yoonkook | teen & up | 3.4k words | canon | first kiss | drinking | emotional constipation | canon ]

“hyung, i wanna kiss you.”

yoongi chokes on his iced americano.

When it comes 2U by xheartsigh (ChocolatMuffin) [ yoonkook | teen & up | 983 words | canon | pining | first kiss ]

On beat Jungkook starts singing and when he sings his emotions are overflowing like the spilled colours of sunsets.

You’re the light of my heart by waarudoizumain [ yoonkook | teen & up | 438 words | angst | character death | soulmates au ]

Jungkook is waiting for the one that will light his shitty world. He’s waiting for someone to pull him out of his miserable life. Someone to take care of him, to love him.
And Jungkook knows- He knows that it’s Yoongi’s role to do so.

Cute by rainbowyoongs [ yoonkook | not rated | 2.1k words | canon | jungkook is whipped | fluff ]

There’s something that’s been on his mind a lot lately, and it seems his thoughts have finally lead to some sort of outcome.

FREE HUGS (YoonKook) by Trash_4_Yoongi [ yoonkook | general | 3.8k words | au | developing friendship | fluff ]

Jungkook loses a bet and has to stand on the street corner with a FREE HUGS sign as punishment.

Blood, Sweat and …Puppies? by Sugashark [ yoonkook | general | 1.8k words | canon | secret relationship | dogs | fluff ]

Jungkook is good at keeping secrets and I’m bad at fluff.

Ticket To Ride by dreaminglasael [ yoonkook | side vhope | teen & up | 3.6k words | au | assassin jungkook | college dropout yoongi ]

‘I was supposed to kill you and get off on the next train stop, but this isn’t the train I thought it was, now we’re on the express train from Seoul to Daegu, and why are you talking to me I’m too awkward to talk to people. I’m always surrounded by dead bodies. They’re not supposed to talk back, I come in, kill a person, and leave. There is no talking. Wait, yes tell me more about how you’re going to Daegu to visit your dying mom for her birthday. Who the fuck would even want you dead?’

yoonkook day 6: soulmates AU by Buttercups [ yoonkook | explicit | 2k words | dom top jungkook | sub bottom yoongi | hook ups | rimming | spanking | strangers to lovers | soulmates au ]

yoongi’s tattoo heart still isn’t filled out and maybe he’s just pretending he doesn’t care - until he hooks up with a certain someone at a club

Shirt and Tie by friendly9host, sornsae [ yoonkook | explicit | 3.3k words | sub bottom yoongi | sub jungkook | rimming | butt plugs | exhibitionism | teacher yoongi | student jungkook | office sex | college au ]

Yoongi couldn’t leave Jeongguk even if he tried.

donut know what I’d do without you by halfpastwo [ yoonkook | general | 4.8k words | pining | puns | coffee shop au | college au ]

AU where Yoongi works at a Krispy Kreme and Jeongguk is a regular. Jeongguk may or may not be smitten.

hold me up against the wall by mintyoongee [ yoonkook | mature | 3.1k words | canon | top jungkook | bottom yoongi | muscle kink | gyms | thigh fucking | wall sex | come eating | rimming ]

through one of jeongguk’s suggestions, he finds that maybe yoongi has a certain thing for his muscles

dress up by florets [ yoonkook | explicit | 4.5k words | canon | jungkook in garter belts ]

“can you help me with this?”

somehow it gets worse - yoongi didn’t think that it was possible for it to get worse - but when jungkook reaches down, fingers toying at one of the straps, clearly asking for yoongi’s help in getting them off - he kind of thinks that he could die, right here on the spot.

Color Psychology by wortmalerei [ yoonkook | general | 2.4k words | au | first meeting | blind date ]

Hoseok tries to improve Yoongi’s non-existent love life by setting him up on a blind date with his co-worker. Yoongi’s flashy dye-job wasn’t part of the equation, though.

while the sunshine goes on sleeping by butterugh (urieskooki) [ yoonkook | not rated | 2.9k words | au | angst | magical realism ]

When Yoongi was younger, he liked to walk along train tracks.

As he grew older the habit stuck.

vegas, baby by maripond [ yoonkook | general | 1.9k words | canon | bbmas | las vegas wedding | drinking ]

they got drunk and they got married.

or alternatively: the vegas fic no one wanted.

sink or swim by fvxc [ yoonkook | teen & up | 3.3k words | canon | hand holding ]

yoongi isn’t really fond of hand holding or any form of skinship, really, but jungkook is an exception. just because.

Oculi by fifthagust [ yoonkook | teen & up | 263 words | canon | fluff ]

“Hey Jeon Jungkook”, the older says.

travel plans by siderum [ yoonkook | not rated | 978 words | canon | hong kong innuendos | flirting ]

“hyung, i looked up more stuff on hong kong,” jeongguk says when they’re both in the bathroom together, like he’s reaching out for yoongi’s approval. yoongi’s brushing his teeth. “it looks like a nice place. is new york not your favorite city anymore?”

Stay with me (I’ll keep you safe) by TsingaDark [ yoonkook | explicit | 2.7k words | blood | violence | zombie apocalypse au ]

Jungkook is on the road again just as the sun is starting to rise, tinting everything in orange hues. His car is too loud in the silence that’s settled over everything, but he’s used to it at this point. There’s something calming about it, the purring of the engine a constant companion while he’s on the go, while everything else around him is dead.

lifelines at midnight by pinkichor [ yoonkook | teen & up | 1.1k words | canon | wrist kink | anxiety | insomniac yoongi ]

“what’s my future like?” yoongi sounded almost fond.
“you’re gonna be famous,” jungkook laughed.

Iron(y) Man by whatthefuck [ yoonkook | teen & up | 2k words | underwear | coffee shop au ]

“You pervert, what the fuck,” He seethes.

“Whoa, no, no!” The man yelps, waving his hands in front of himself in defense. “When you bent down to grab your pen, i’m not gonna lie, I was checking you out, but you were wearing Christmas boxers-”

“-So, you had to sit down and ask me about them?? ”

“Well, yeah! You’re wearing Avengers underwear, and Iron Man has an elf hat instead of a helmet, I want them.”

let’s get drunk on our tears by muhammie [ yoonkook | general | 1.8k words | au | fluff | angst with a happy ending | jungkook gets kicked out | worried yoongi ]

jungkook got kicked out of his house. and it’s raining outside.
but he doesn’t care and now he’s singing on the streets.
yoongi simply followed the voice to find a drenched, skinny boy.

all my love (for you) by muhammie [ yoonkook | teen & up | 3.3k words | au | single dad yoongi | angst with a happy ending ]

‘’what was he like?’’

‘’beautiful. uncle namjoon taught you the word ethereal, right? yeah, he was that and more. he had a voice of an angel and stars in his eyes.’’ sana giggled, ‘’that’s not possible, papa.’’

‘’well, you didn’t know him,’’ yoongi replied, booping her nose.

or that fic where yoongi’s daughter finds an old photo album tucked away and yoongi is still in love with jungkook.

yoonkook short fic recs 📕💜

A while ago I did a yoonkook long fic recs, so this time I decided to help those of you who don’t really have that much time to read a long af story, or are just too lazy to do it, and made a small compilation of 25 fics under 5k words, enjoy!

reblog.comment:
yoonkook short fic recs 📕💜

A while ago I did a yoonkook long fic recs, so this time I decided to help those of you who don’t really have that much time to read a long af story, or are just too lazy to do it, and made a small compilation of 25 fics under 5k words, enjoy!

[[MORE]]

The Perfect Take by jkseuphoria [ yoonkook | teen & up | 3.8k words | side jihope | parallel universes | angst with a happy ending | hyyh/euphoria au ]

As he follows him to the car, Jungkook thinks, someday. In some universe, this hesitance will go. Destiny will give us a chance, all seven of us.

Jungkook’s never believed much in the concept of God, but for once in his life, he prays.

Need an Extra Hand? by Honey0613 [ yoonkook | explicit | 4.1k words | au | handyman yoongi | voyeurism | sex toys | masturbation | top yoongi | power bottom jungkook ]

Yoongi works as a handyman at a fancy apartment complex. He gets a work order request, but when he arrives at the unit, the tenant (Jungkook) is still home … and in the middle of masturbating!

What happens when Yoongi decides to stay and watch the show?

of first kisses and bitter coffee by taers [ yoonkook | teen & up | 3.4k words | canon | first kiss | drinking | emotional constipation | canon ]

“hyung, i wanna kiss you.”

yoongi chokes on his iced americano.

When it comes 2U by xheartsigh (ChocolatMuffin) [ yoonkook | teen & up | 983 words | canon | pining | first kiss ]

On beat Jungkook starts singing and when he sings his emotions are overflowing like the spilled colours of sunsets.

You’re the light of my heart by waarudoizumain [ yoonkook | teen & up | 438 words | angst | character death | soulmates au ]

Jungkook is waiting for the one that will light his shitty world. He’s waiting for someone to pull him out of his miserable life. Someone to take care of him, to love him.
And Jungkook knows- He knows that it’s Yoongi’s role to do so.

Cute by rainbowyoongs [ yoonkook | not rated | 2.1k words | canon | jungkook is whipped | fluff ]

There’s something that’s been on his mind a lot lately, and it seems his thoughts have finally lead to some sort of outcome.

FREE HUGS (YoonKook) by Trash_4_Yoongi [ yoonkook | general | 3.8k words | au | developing friendship | fluff ]

Jungkook loses a bet and has to stand on the street corner with a FREE HUGS sign as punishment.

Blood, Sweat and …Puppies? by Sugashark [ yoonkook | general | 1.8k words | canon | secret relationship | dogs | fluff ]

Jungkook is good at keeping secrets and I’m bad at fluff.

Ticket To Ride by dreaminglasael [ yoonkook | side vhope | teen & up | 3.6k words | au | assassin jungkook | college dropout yoongi ]

‘I was supposed to kill you and get off on the next train stop, but this isn’t the train I thought it was, now we’re on the express train from Seoul to Daegu, and why are you talking to me I’m too awkward to talk to people. I’m always surrounded by dead bodies. They’re not supposed to talk back, I come in, kill a person, and leave. There is no talking. Wait, yes tell me more about how you’re going to Daegu to visit your dying mom for her birthday. Who the fuck would even want you dead?’

yoonkook day 6: soulmates AU by Buttercups [ yoonkook | explicit | 2k words | dom top jungkook | sub bottom yoongi | hook ups | rimming | spanking | strangers to lovers | soulmates au ]

yoongi’s tattoo heart still isn’t filled out and maybe he’s just pretending he doesn’t care - until he hooks up with a certain someone at a club

Shirt and Tie by friendly9host, sornsae [ yoonkook | explicit | 3.3k words | sub bottom yoongi | sub jungkook | rimming | butt plugs | exhibitionism | teacher yoongi | student jungkook | office sex | college au ]

Yoongi couldn’t leave Jeongguk even if he tried.

donut know what I’d do without you by halfpastwo [ yoonkook | general | 4.8k words | pining | puns | coffee shop au | college au ]

AU where Yoongi works at a Krispy Kreme and Jeongguk is a regular. Jeongguk may or may not be smitten.

hold me up against the wall by mintyoongee [ yoonkook | mature | 3.1k words | canon | top jungkook | bottom yoongi | muscle kink | gyms | thigh fucking | wall sex | come eating | rimming ]

through one of jeongguk’s suggestions, he finds that maybe yoongi has a certain thing for his muscles

dress up by florets [ yoonkook | explicit | 4.5k words | canon | jungkook in garter belts ]

“can you help me with this?”

somehow it gets worse - yoongi didn’t think that it was possible for it to get worse - but when jungkook reaches down, fingers toying at one of the straps, clearly asking for yoongi’s help in getting them off - he kind of thinks that he could die, right here on the spot.

Color Psychology by wortmalerei [ yoonkook | general | 2.4k words | au | first meeting | blind date ]

Hoseok tries to improve Yoongi’s non-existent love life by setting him up on a blind date with his co-worker. Yoongi’s flashy dye-job wasn’t part of the equation, though.

while the sunshine goes on sleeping by butterugh (urieskooki) [ yoonkook | not rated | 2.9k words | au | angst | magical realism ]

When Yoongi was younger, he liked to walk along train tracks.

As he grew older the habit stuck.

vegas, baby by maripond [ yoonkook | general | 1.9k words | canon | bbmas | las vegas wedding | drinking ]

they got drunk and they got married.

or alternatively: the vegas fic no one wanted.

sink or swim by fvxc [ yoonkook | teen & up | 3.3k words | canon | hand holding ]

yoongi isn’t really fond of hand holding or any form of skinship, really, but jungkook is an exception. just because.

Oculi by fifthagust [ yoonkook | teen & up | 263 words | canon | fluff ]

“Hey Jeon Jungkook”, the older says.

travel plans by siderum [ yoonkook | not rated | 978 words | canon | hong kong innuendos | flirting ]

“hyung, i looked up more stuff on hong kong,” jeongguk says when they’re both in the bathroom together, like he’s reaching out for yoongi’s approval. yoongi’s brushing his teeth. “it looks like a nice place. is new york not your favorite city anymore?”

Stay with me (I’ll keep you safe) by TsingaDark [ yoonkook | explicit | 2.7k words | blood | violence | zombie apocalypse au ]

Jungkook is on the road again just as the sun is starting to rise, tinting everything in orange hues. His car is too loud in the silence that’s settled over everything, but he’s used to it at this point. There’s something calming about it, the purring of the engine a constant companion while he’s on the go, while everything else around him is dead.

lifelines at midnight by pinkichor [ yoonkook | teen & up | 1.1k words | canon | wrist kink | anxiety | insomniac yoongi ]

“what’s my future like?” yoongi sounded almost fond.
“you’re gonna be famous,” jungkook laughed.

Iron(y) Man by whatthefuck [ yoonkook | teen & up | 2k words | underwear | coffee shop au ]

“You pervert, what the fuck,” He seethes.

“Whoa, no, no!” The man yelps, waving his hands in front of himself in defense. “When you bent down to grab your pen, i’m not gonna lie, I was checking you out, but you were wearing Christmas boxers-”

“-So, you had to sit down and ask me about them?? ”

“Well, yeah! You’re wearing Avengers underwear, and Iron Man has an elf hat instead of a helmet, I want them.”

let’s get drunk on our tears by muhammie [ yoonkook | general | 1.8k words | au | fluff | angst with a happy ending | jungkook gets kicked out | worried yoongi ]

jungkook got kicked out of his house. and it’s raining outside.
but he doesn’t care and now he’s singing on the streets.
yoongi simply followed the voice to find a drenched, skinny boy.

all my love (for you) by muhammie [ yoonkook | teen & up | 3.3k words | au | single dad yoongi | angst with a happy ending ]

‘’what was he like?’’

‘’beautiful. uncle namjoon taught you the word ethereal, right? yeah, he was that and more. he had a voice of an angel and stars in his eyes.’’ sana giggled, ‘’that’s not possible, papa.’’

‘’well, you didn’t know him,’’ yoongi replied, booping her nose.

or that fic where yoongi’s daughter finds an old photo album tucked away and yoongi is still in love with jungkook.

blog.name: fykook
blog.title: LOVE IS NOT OVER
